# Rust-specific patterns for .goneatignore
# Generated by goneat init for Rust projects

# Generated by Cargo
# will have compiled files and executables
debug/
target/
target-*/

# Remove Cargo.lock from gitignore if creating an executable, leave it for libraries
# More information here https://doc.rust-lang.org/cargo/guide/cargo-toml-vs-cargo-lock.html
Cargo.lock

# These are backup files generated by rustfmt
**/*.rs.bk

# MSVC Windows builds
*.pdb

# IDE and editor files
.vscode/
.idea/
*.swp
*.swo

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Log files
*.log

# Temporary files
*.tmp
*.bak

# Build artifacts
dist/
bin/

# Test coverage
coverage/
*.profraw

# Documentation
docs/book/

# Benchmark results
benchmarks/

# Development tools
.cargo/
rustfmt.toml

# Environment files
.env

# Backup files
*.orig
*.rej
